synopsis: A side story of Darker than BLACK, also known as Episode 26. A Contractor was killed and it was rumored that his corpse and possessions were buried under a Sakura tree. Hei and the others (including the Police) decide to investigate.

title.en: Darker than Black: Beneath Cherry Blossoms in Full Bloom...
title.jp: Darker than Black: Kuro no Keiyakusha - Sakura no Hana no Mankai no Shita
